snippet: Daimler AG said it will recall one million newer-model Mercedes-Benz vehicles worldwide due to the risk of fire, after 51 fires were reported....

headline.main: Rituals, Wild Animals and a Few Giggles
headline.print_headline: High Priestesses of the Runway Wild

lead_paragraph: Daimler AG said it will recall one million newer-model Mercedes-Benz vehicles worldwide due to the risk of fire, after 51 fires were reported.
